doc.previous: It has always been important for the Space Telescope to capture the public s imagination given the considerable contribution of taxpayers to its construction and operational costs 147 After the difficult early years when the faulty mirror severely dented Hubble s reputation with the public the first servicing mission allowed its rehabilitation as the corrected optics produced numerous remarkable images
doc.after: Several initiatives have helped to keep the public informed about Hubble activities
